import {React} from 'react'
import Child from './Child'

function Parent() {
const number1 =""
const number2 =""

const store=()=>{
number1=number1
 number2=number2


}

console.log(number1)
    return (

        
       <>
       <label htmlFor="input1">Number 1</label>
       <input type="number" id='input1'  onChange={number1=value} value={number1} />

       <label htmlFor="input2">Number 1</label>
       <input type="number" id='input2' onchange={number2=value} />
       <button onClick={()=>store()} >button</button>
       <Child number1={number1} number2={number2=value} value={number2} />
       </>

    )
}

export default Parent
